sentences.en: Civil servants must be fair and honest and work selflessly in the public interests.
sentences.cn: 公务员必须公正廉洁,克己奉公.

sentences.en: Earol, who selflessly subsisted on half rations during two months of heavy fighting, headed the defense.
sentences.cn: 易尔罗无私地将自己的配给减半, 领导着守军度过了两个月的艰苦战斗.

sentences.en: He worked selflessly towards his goal.
sentences.cn: 他忘我地朝他的目标奋斗着.

sentences.en: I've never known anyone who cared so selflessly about children.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过如此无私地关心孩子的人。

sentences.en: If we serve selflessly, we receive spiritual and worldly blessings.
sentences.cn: 如果我们无私地服务, 我们便得到灵感及祝福.

sentences.en: It drizzles sometimes , moistening the thirsty fields lightly and selflessly.
sentences.cn: 它大多是毛毛细雨, 轻柔而又无私地滋润着干涸的大地.

sentences.en: Old masters were hard and selflessly guide us: how to steer?
sentences.cn: 老船长们辛勤而又无私地指导我们: 如何掌舵?

sentences.en: On the blog, he has selflessly posted the results of his research, hoping that they will be of assistance to others.
sentences.cn: 在博客中，他还无私地把自己所有成熟的研究成果和作品，都张贴了出来，力求对别人有所帮助。

sentences.en: Outside - wealth giving: To help other with your property selflessly ( no for your personal appetency ).
sentences.cn: 外财布施: 为帮助别人无私付出物质钱财 ( 不是为一己之欲 ).

sentences.en: She could never love anything or anyone so selflessly as they did.
sentences.cn: 她永远不能像她们那样无私地爱什么事业或什么人.

sentences.en: She often does everything for me selflessly.
sentences.cn: 她也是这样无私地对我的。

sentences.en: Since they speak straightforwardly and selflessly and never appear to grovel or fawn.
sentences.cn: 因为他们说话正直无私,容色也不阿谀谄媚.

sentences.en: The drawing above suggests that people should selflessly dedicate themselves to their community as a whole.
sentences.cn: 上面的这幅画启发人们应该无私地把自己奉献给整个社会。

sentences.en: They selflessly gave their all to the great cause of education.
sentences.cn: 他们把自己的一生献给了伟大的教育事业.

sentences.en: This kind brave and makes us to be very affected selflessly.
sentences.cn: 这种勇敢和无私令我们非常非常感动.

sentences.en: Those who give selflessly are blessed; those who do good deeds are happy.
sentences.cn: 布施的人有福, 行善的人快乐.

sentences.en: We have to serve selflessly and everything else will come.
sentences.cn: 我们必须无私地服务,其它一切就会到来.

sentences.en: While Kobe and Shaq were teammates, Kobe played his role to perfection, selflessly.
sentences.cn: 当科比和奥尼尔是队友的时候, 科比自己的角色扮演的很完美, 很无私.

words.tran_cn: 自私自利；自我中心；任性
